 How do I buy my fares? 
   Metropolitan ticket offices and sales outlets 
 Special Offers 
 Metropolitan ticket offices and sales outlets 
 To purchase a metropolitan transit pass or ticket (TRAM/TRAIN), buy an OPUS card or obtain information, visit one of our  metropolitan ticket offices . You can also buy some tickets for the metro, bus or commuter train and the OPUS card at the sales outlet. 
 Note: please validate the availability of the desired fares at the sales outlet before you move.  
 1 Enter an address or the name of a place 
 2 Specify the desired type of sales outlet 
 3 Click a marker on the map for more information
